name: SEO.RUN
description:
We are SEO.RUN/SEO.RU a company founded in 1999 in Russia. We specialize in search engine optimization and website promotion to increase profits for our clients. With over 18 years in business, we have increased sales for more than 3,000 clients.Today we are a fast-growing team of young, talented specialists. The company employs 34 people. High competencies in SEO are not only the skillset of subject matter experts in the company ​but also of our client managers.
